compiler_minimum_required(3,0,4);
project('project', 'none');

// executables & dynamic libraries

create_package('$(PMAKE_PROJECT_NAME)-$(PROJECT_VERSION)-$(PMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR)-$(PMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME)');
